thread.title: British businesses say cyber attacks constant
thread.title_full: British businesses say cyber attacks constant

title: British businesses say cyber attacks constant
text:
British businesses say cyber attacks constant 
Reuters Saturday 24th October, 2015 
British business leaders on Saturday urged police to make cyber crime an urgent priority following an attack on broadband provider TalkTalk, saying firms face continual security breaches....
